## ./pachctl stop-job

Stop a job.

### Synopsis


Stop a job.  The job will be stopped immediately.

```
./pachctl stop-job job-id
```

```
      --no-metrics   Don't report user metrics for this command
  -v, --verbose      Output verbose logs
```
